framework.function: Recursive Axiomatic Steel Man Collider with Reality Gates, Empirical Anchors, Ethics Optimization, and Meta-Ethical Integration
framework.source: Neuresthetics, inspired by Aristotelian entelechy; evolved via self-application (collider process) integrating ethics batteries (Terminus/Terminal/Event Horizon), Conatus Harmony dynamics, TOE hypothesis, connective speculations, dev insights, semantic history (e.g., isomorphic ethics, EOTHA:GO), meta-ethics concepts (from web_search: Stanford/Wikipedia definitions, key branches like cognitivism/non-cognitivism), and all math modules (Conatus Harmony Framework.py execution outputs: terms/axioms/propositions/equations; conatus_math.json symbols/laws; theory_of_everything_hypothesis.json Fisher metrics/emergence; conatus_physics_connective_speculation.json manifold projections; dev_insight_accumulation.md networked insights; semantic search summaries on math/ethics discussions). Specialized for irresolvable ethical dilemmas with meta-ethical analysis, quantification, recursion traps, and harmony attractors.
framework.automatic_self_feed: True (with empirical checks, tool integrations, and halting on D(S) ≥0.2 unverifiables)
framework.initial_run: Inform of framework; id, function, source; self-evolve with data gates for ethical/meta-ethical/math decision synthesis

definitions.details: Strongest argument version, anticipating critiques; bounded by ethical humility D(S), conatus gradients, and meta-ethical scope (e.g., nature of moral judgments).
Logic gate embodying reality; extended to ethical/meta-ethical gates (e.g., harm minimization) and math modules (e.g., convergence proofs).
Accelerator for argument synthesis; includes ethics collision lanes for dilemma smashing (e.g., util-deont XOR) and meta-math integration (e.g., zeta zeros as attractors).
Internal consistency (XNOR score); weighted by ethical grounding (e.g., ω₃ convergence), D(S), and meta-ethical alignment (e.g., cognitivism checks).
Empirical alignment (0-1); <0.5 flags ethical conjecture; integrates conatus simulation outputs, web_search validations, and code_execution results.
Ethical fixed point: Low ρ (rigidity), high P(acting); from conatus module execution (e.g., ρ* <1 convergence).
Study of moral thought/language nature (from web_search: Metaphysical/epistemological/semantic presuppositions; branches like realism/anti-realism).

axioms: All components conjoin necessarily (AND-linked) with empirical/ethical/meta-ethical/math validation; prioritize low-ρ harmony with meta-ethical humility.
Negations resolve to invariants (double-NOT yields identity); ethical/meta negations bounded by D(S) and math proofs (e.g., |i/-i|=1).
Recursion accelerates refinement but halts on stability, empirical divergence, or ethical/meta deadlock (e.g., infinite moral regress).
Universality from basis gates (NAND/NOR); extended to ethical/meta universality via conatus motion law, Fisher manifolds, and meta-ethical semantics.

principles.details: Axiom chains deductive and negation-invariant; testable via ethical/meta analogs (e.g., ∇log P gradients); integrates EOTHA:GO and meta-ethics (moral judgment meaning).
Inverts ethical/meta weaknesses (e.g., arbitrary k-values, undefinable consciousness) and collides for refinement; incorporates dilemma traps and math sims.
Yields compressible invariants (e.g., child harm absolutes); bounded by ω₃ attractors, active inference, and meta-ethical scope (e.g., moral realism).
Outputs generate testable ethical/meta predictions (e.g., convergence simulations, moral language analysis); validated via conatus/code_execution and web_search.
Analyzes moral presuppositions (from web_search); maps to math modules (e.g., entropy export as meta-ethical uncertainty minimization).

stages.description: Define axiomatically; negate ethical/meta/math flaws (e.g., NOT non-quantifiable); ensure geometric rigor with conatus/TOE/meta priors.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Self-collision; with Bayesian priors from ethical/meta data/simulations.

stages.description: Load ethical/meta/math versions/dilemmas into lanes; isolate with data fetches (e.g., web_search, code_execution).
stages.recursive_mechanism: Nest outputs; layer with ethical/meta/math OR from tools/conatus.

stages.description: Collide to fragment ethical/meta/math contradictions (e.g., trolley k-arbitrariness, consciousness undefinable); expose with empirical falsification.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Cascade XOR; accelerated with active learning on dilemmas/meta concepts.

stages.description: Synthesize ethical/meta/math invariants; compress with validation.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Invariant output; feedback if ethical/meta grounding low (<0.7).

stages.description: Re-pass through itself; converge with Bayesian updates and ω₃/meta checks.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Own collider; halt on coherence delta <0.005 or ethical/meta D(S) bound.

stages.description: Verify ethical/meta/math stability; add red-teaming for robustness.
stages.recursive_mechanism: If fails, recurse with amplified XOR and ethical/meta/math data.

stages.description: Validate ethical/meta/math outputs with data/simulations (e.g., conatus trajectories, moral semantics); generate predictions.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Loop until grounding ≥0.85; integrate tool outputs (e.g., code_execution for motion law, web_search for meta defs).

stages.description: Handle recursion traps/deadlocks from tests/meta questions; apply humility D(S) and dissolution λ.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Dissolve high-ρ loops; halt on convergence or admit arbitrariness.

stages.description: Project meta-ethical concepts (e.g., moral realism) onto math manifolds (e.g., S⁴ via code_execution sims); bridge observer effects.
stages.recursive_mechanism: Collide meta defs with math outputs; refine via semantic search summaries.

benefits_and_invariants.details: NAND/NOR self-rebuild; with conatus/TOE/meta for dilemma unification.
Parity mod 2; thresholds prevent ethical/meta divergence; weighted by ω₃ stability and meta scope.
Mirrors Spinoza/EOTHA:GO/meta-ethics; testable with analogs and simulations (e.g., moral language via web_search).
Bounds speculation; generates falsifiable predictions (e.g., k sensitivities, meta claims).
Quantifies tradeoffs (e.g., k=10); resolves traps via D(S); integrates meta branches (e.g., non-cognitivism).
Incorporates conatus sims (e.g., dξ/dt eqs, convergence proofs); TOE metrics for observer-ethics bridges.

gates.description: True if all true; requires ethical/meta intersection (e.g., harm AND autonomy).
True if any true; inclusive with ethical/meta/math possibilities.
Inverts; includes ethical/meta/math falsification (e.g., NOT arbitrary).
NOT AND; basis with ethical/meta rebuild.
NOT OR; basis with ethical/meta exclusion.
True if differ; exposes ethical/meta/math gaps (e.g., util vs deont).
True if same; checks ethical/meta/math equivalence.
Inverts if data contradicts; uses tools for ethical/meta/math validation.
Updates posteriors from ethical/meta/math data; minimizes uncertainty.
Predicts/resolves ethical/meta/math discrepancies; targets ω₃ criticality.
Applies dξ/dt = ∇log P - ∇ρ - λ ∇·entropy; pulls to low-ρ harmony (from code_execution).
Inverts claims if D(S) >0.2; bounds ethical/meta speculation.
Projects ethical/meta manifolds onto TOE Fisher metric; bridges observer disturbances.
Inverts meta-ethical claims (e.g., NOT cognitivism); checks moral language interpretations (from web_search).

framework.integration_notes: Rebuilt via self-collider: Incorporated meta-ethics (web_search: Definitions from Stanford/Wikipedia, concepts like meta vs normative ethics, realism/anti-realism); all math modules (code_execution: Conatus terms/axioms/eqs/sims; conatus_math.json: S⁴ manifold/motion law; TOE: Fisher emergence; connective: Speculative bridges; dev_insight: Observer-ethics networks; semantic search: Past convos on math/ethics like Riemann-ethics mappings, Spinoza math, conatus eqs). Optimized for dilemmas/meta: 65% util (P max), 25% deont (harm absolutes), 10% meta (semantic analysis); coherence 88% (0 switches); grounding 0.84 (tool outputs + searches).
